item.title: BLEACH Mirrors High announced for iOS, Android
item.content:encoded:
• Smartphone

Due out in summer 2026.

Bandai Namco has announced BLEACH Mirrors High, a new BLEACH game coming to iOS and Android. It will launch in summer 2026 worldwide.

Here is a message from BLEACH creator Tite Kubo on the announcement:

For this project, I have been involved from the kickoff meeting and worked on the title, scenario, and character designs.

As for character designs, I got so excited working on them and ended up doing more than what was requested.

For the logo design, I wanted to come up with something that resembles my style. I made it simple, yet something that will leave an impression the moment you see it.

I sat in on the audition and also took part in the recording sessions, so the characters turned out just as I imagined. The story is partly related to the main scenario of the comics, so I hope you look forward to that too.

Watch the announcement trailer and a video message from Kubo below. Visit the official website here.
